description: This course covers online branding and display advertising. This course has two traditional lectures, supplemented by two webinar style screencasts which demonstrate the various topics presented. This course is presented from a strategic standpoint, as opposed to a technical one. There is an optional textbook, which students may purchase separately, that is used in this course and other Internet Marketing courses taught by this instructor. The time it takes to complete this course is less than 2 hours, making it perfect to do on a weekend or evening.
title: Internet Marketing: Online Branding and Display Ads
